modifications: Added Exchange Rate Scheduler initialization in lifespan startup
Added Exchange Rate Scheduler shutdown in lifespan teardown

patterns_discovered: Graceful startup and shutdown of background agents in FastAPI lifespan
Logging agent initialization status with success/warning indicators
Non-blocking scheduler initialization with optional immediate run
Error handling for each agent's startup and shutdown
gotchas_discovered: Potential race conditions if scheduler initialization fails
Dependency on specific module imports within try/except blocks

key_achievements: Integrated exchange rate scheduler with FastAPI application lifecycle
Added proper logging for scheduler startup and shutdown

recommendations: Consider adding more robust error handling for scheduler initialization
Implement a centralized background task management system
Add configuration options for scheduler run parameters
